Title: Hi no Tori "Dougo Onsen-hen"
Description: ['A collaborative anime between ', Hi no Tori, ' and the Dougo Onsen hot spring bath house. The anime is part of a revitalization project for the Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture bath house that began on January 15. The Dougo Onsen building is 125 years old and certain areas were due for a facelift. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
